pkgmetadata.longdescription: Managing and Building of Quarterly Life Tables // Manages, builds and computes statistics and datasets for the construction of quarterly (sub-annual) life tables by exploiting micro-data from either a general or an insured population. References: Pava and Lled (2022) doi:10.1111/rssa.12769. Pava and Lled (2023) doi:10.1017/asb.2023.16. Acknowledgements: The authors wish to thank Consellera de Educacin, Universidades y Empleo, Generalitat Valenciana (grant AICO/2021/257), Ministerio de Economa e Innovacin (grant PID2021-128228NB-I00) and Fundacin Mapfre (grant 'Modelizacin espacial e intra-anual de la mortalidad en Espaa. Una herramienta automtica para el clculo de productos de vida') for supporting this research.
